document_title.reason: Large, prominent top-left text 'Invoice' acting as document title.

sender_name.reason: Top-left grouped text under the title lists the issuing company name 'Craigs' Landscaping'.

sender_address.reason: Address block directly under sender name in top-left: street line and city/state/ZIP. Normalized by joining lines and trimming.

sender_phone.reason: Phone-like number printed to the right of the sender block: '123-456-7890'.

sender_email.reason: Email appears below phone in sender contact area; normalized to lowercase.

sender_website.reason: Website/domain printed under email in the sender contact block.

recipient_name.reason: Under the 'Bill To' header the first line is the recipient/company name 'Smith Enterprises'.

recipient_address.reason: Address lines under 'Bill To' block: street and city/state/ZIP. Normalized by joining lines.

pay_to_name.reason: No 'Pay To' or explicit payee name / payment party block present on this invoice.

pay_to_bank.reason: No bank name or routing/payment bank details are visible on this document.

pay_to_account_number.reason: No account number or payment account reference present in the visible layout.

invoice_number.reason: Labeled 'Invoice # 12345' in the invoice details box; extracted the identifier digits.

invoice_date.reason: Label 'Invoice date 08/01/2024' present in the invoice details area; normalized to ISO-8601.

due_date.reason: Label 'Due date 08/31/2024' present in the invoice details box; normalized to ISO-8601.

payment_terms.reason: Invoice details show 'Terms Net 30' indicating payment terms.

line_items.reason: Table with headers 'Product/Services | Qty/Hrs | Rate | Amount' contains two rows. Quantities and monetary values parsed from the respective columns; currency symbol removed for numeric normalization.

line_item_description.reason: The document contains multiple line item descriptions in a table; a single scalar 'line_item_description' is not applicable. Use the 'line_items' array for per-row descriptions.

line_item_quantity.reason: Multiple quantities are present in the table; the singular 'line_item_quantity' field is not applicable. Quantities provided per-row in 'line_items' array.

line_item_unit_price.reason: Multiple unit prices exist in the table; the singular field is not applicable. See 'line_items' array for per-row unit_price values.

line_item_amount.reason: Multiple line amounts exist; use the 'line_items' array for per-row amounts rather than a single scalar.

subtotal.reason: The totals block shows 'Subtotal $650.00' under the line items; numeric value extracted and currency removed for normalization.

discount.reason: Totals area lists 'Discount -$65.00'; captured as negative numeric amount per schema guidance.

tax_rate.reason: Totals block shows 'Tax 8.5%'; percentage parsed and normalized to numeric percent value.

tax_amount.reason: Monetary tax amount printed next to the tax label: '$49.73'; currency stripped for numeric normalization.

total.reason: Final total shown as '$634.73' in the totals area; numeric normalization removed currency symbol.

currency.reason: All monetary values are prefixed with '$' symbol which indicates US Dollars; normalized to 'USD'.

layout_notes.value: Light-blue boxed invoice details ('Bill To' / 'Invoice Details') across the page; two-column header with sender contact on the left and contact info on the right; clean table layout with four columns (Product/Services, Qty/Hrs, Rate, Amount).
layout_notes.reason: Observed visual layout: colored details box, header grouping, and clear table column structure useful for downstream parsing.

extracted_by.reason: No provenance or OCR/extraction agent string printed on the document.
